name: Jungle Jewels HD
description:
The Jungle is full of sparkling jewels - a paradise for treasure hunters! And now it’s in High Definition! Welcome to Jungle Jewels HD!

PLEASE NOTE: Jungle Jewels HD is quite memory intensive. If you're experiencing issues, please close all running applications then restart your iPad.

Jungle Jewels HD combines an incredibly addictive gameplay, 4 different game modes and probably the most beautiful jewel artwork you’ve ever seen. This game is highly recommended for all fans of puzzle and match three games.

MATCH THREE PUZZLE FUN ON YOUR IPAD

Swap jewels vertically or horizontally to form groups of three or more same-colored jewels, collect coins and discover the mystical masks in the temple one level at a time!

FOUR GAME MODES

Classic Mode – Try to complete all your tasks in four levels before the timer runs out
Score Attack – Score big by completing all tasks before the timer runs out
Relaxation Mode – Unlimited time! Take as much time as needed to complete your tasks.
Endless Mode – Endless gameplay. No time limits; no tasks.

KEY FEATURES OF JUNGLE JEWELS HD

* Amazingly beautiful high resolution Retina graphics
* Hours of match-3 puzzle gaming!
* Beautifully illustrated artwork with great attention to detail
* Exciting match three gameplay taken to a new dimension
* 4 compelling game modes: Classic, Relaxation, Score Attack, and Endless
* Easily share your high scores with the world and compare with your Facebook friends
* Publish your high scores to your Facebook wall
* Enjoy a great dynamic soundtrack that gets more and more exciting each level
